divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were camping, sitting outside at the campfire and I noticed an orange glowing object immediately to the west moving due north, I told my son to look quickly, we watched it travel due north for about a minute then it turned heading northwest and within another minute it disappeared with a small flash of white light. During the entire duration of the event there was absolutely no sound from the object and no sign of normal aircraft navigational lights or strobes.
Summary: Orange Object moving with no sound, no strobes, changed direction
trends: There have been no other sightings in Milton
This sighting has never been favorited.
